content: Quest'anno, invece di farci regali di Natale, abbiamo donato l'importo che avremmo speso per i regali a un ente di beneficenza.
translations: eng:Instead of giving each other Christmas presents this year, we donated the amount we would have spent on presents to a ch
eng:Instead of giving each other Christmas presents this year, we donated the amount we would've spent on presents to a char
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
